Function Documentation

TestCase_GC00100_GetSystemTime (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
6478589335255d6287c355b1a109565b
Pre Conditions:
setup() initializes the context.
Focus:
This test case checks the TEE_GetSystemTime of time API correctly called.
Test Steps:
Call all API function with proper prototypes and check return value.
Post Conditions:
teardown() closes session and finalizes the context

No

TestCase_GC00320_Wait_infinite (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
6478589335255d6287c355b1a109565b
Pre Conditions:
setup() initializes the context
Focus:
This test case checks the TEE_Wait of time API called with TEEC_TIMEOUT_INFINITE argument. Since it can't be cancelled, if will loop indefinitely until TestSuite timeout.
Test Steps:
Call all API function with proper prototypes and check return values.
Post Conditions:
teardown() closes session and finalizes the context

TestCase_BC00431_GetTaTime_overflow (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
6478589335255d6287c355b1a109565b
Pre Conditions:
setup() initializes the context
Focus:
This test case checks the TEE_GetTAPersistentTime called with overflow of persistent time.
Test Steps:
Set time to max value with TEE_SetTAPersistentTime(), get time with TEE_GetTAPersistentTime() returns TEE_ERROR_OVERFLOW, set new time to value 0 with TEE_SetTAPersistentTime().
Post Conditions:
teardown() closes session and finalizes the context
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
No
Basic Testcase:
Yes
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
311A
Test ID:

TestCase_GC00610_SysTime_Monotonicity (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
6478589335255d6287c355b1a109565b
Pre Conditions:
setup() initializes the context
Focus:
This test case checks the monotonicity of TEE_GetSystemTime.
Test Steps:
All Time API call must succeed 100 times and the time calculated between 2 consecutive calls should be >=0
Post Conditions:
teardown() closes session and finalizes the context
Manual Execution:
No

Yes
